title: 1_1 Add new sportsman and verify saved data
name: 1_1 Add new sportsman and verify saved data

test-steps.description: Given User opens Login Page and login to the base page

When add new sportsmen with data:［
| lastName     | firstName | middleName | birthDate  | Region1       | FST1    | trainer1       | style | age    | year | cardAvailability  |
| Automation01 | Auto01    | Automiddle | 07-07-1987 | Kyrovogradska | Dinamo  | TheBestTrainer |  FS   | Junior | 2015 | Produced          |］
Then user finds added sportsmen and checks saved data

cause.message:
Data in the first record is not as expected
Expected: <[Automation01 Auto01 Automiddle, Kyrovogradska, Dinamo, 2015, FS]>
     but: was <[Automation01 Auto01 Automiddle, Kirovogradska, Dinamo, 2015, FS]>
